column1: Ask yourself: “am I being a donut today?”
Try to say this out loud if you want a laugh today: “A box of mixed biscuits in a biscuit mixer”.
I see some donut activities goin on
"Why don't you make like a tree and get the fuck outta here "
If anyone here believes in telekinesis raise my hand
It's easy to quit smoking - I've done it a thousand times!
Build a man a fire and he'll be warm for a day. Set a man on fire and he'll be warm for the rest of his life.
[Death] liked black. It went with anything. It went with everything.. sooner or later.
